name: Chonghua Frost Field
description:
Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' Physical DMG is converted to Cryo DMG, and their Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 3
descriptionraw: Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' $[K100] is converted to $[K101], and their <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 3</color>
